summary: This is an automatic email reply from a prosecutor indicating they are on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact information for urgent matters related to the United States v. Epstein case. It shows the ongoing legal proceedings against Epstein in August 2019.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: Presiding judge over the trial the email author is currently involved in, referenced as 'the Honorable Ronnie Abrams'.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Contact person for urgent matters related to the United States v. Epstein case, as provided in the automatic reply.

events.title: Automatic Reply Sent
events.description: An automatic email reply is sent indicating the author is on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact instructions for the Epstein case.

events.title: United States v. Epstein Trial
events.description: Ongoing criminal trial referenced as United States v. Epstein 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), indicating active legal proceedings against Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The email shows ongoing legal proceedings in United States v. Epstein (case 19 Cr. 490) as of August 2019.
A prosecutor was on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams in August 2019 while the Epstein case was active.
The automatic reply provides specific contact instructions for urgent matters related to the Epstein case.
